// About

Donta'

I'm a solo entrepreneur and full-stack engineer with a graphic design background. I believe the best software comes from understanding both the user's needs and the technical possibilities.

Currently, I'm focused on Solon AI — an AI-powered code review tool that helps development teams ship better code faster. My goal is to reach $5K MRR and build software that creates real value.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, tending to my digital garden, or thinking about the intersection of design and engineering.
